alert.note: Alert for Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 1:59PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Oswego County through 245 PM EDT... At 158 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Oswego, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oswego, Fulton, Sandy Island Beach State Park, Pulaski, Selkirk Shores State Park, Nine Mile Point, Mexico Point State Park, Battle Island State Park, Hastings, Scriba, Volney, Palermo, New Haven, Minetto, Mexico, Sandy Creek, Hannibal, and Parish. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
